p: It is a qualitative index that signifies the efficacy of a single plant species from the list of plants given as a response by the interviewees. EL is calculated by CL = Ui, where Ui is the total number of times a particular plant species is mentioned as the most effective from the list of plant species level. EL indicates plant species showing the most effective therapeutic potentials. A high EL denotes the most efficacious plant.
